perk.name: jz_MiningSkill
perk.desc_key: Gain experience by breaking blocks with Pickaxes and Shovels to improve your use of them by 3% faster swing speed per Lv, 3% less stamina per use per Lv and 2% bonus dismemberment per Lv.

triggered_effect.message: You have leveled up Mining!
You have leveled up Mining!
